config.text:
Instructions


This is a detailed dashboard that provides details of areas where data hygiene may be an issue, identifies data that needs to be cleaned up at source, or is worked around in Axonius.


Data Hygiene is key to ensure that your organization has the information you expect to enable you to ask accurate questions of that data

Change Log


3/8/25

Created
Correlation & Source Data Hygiene Checks

68a3dfa329b270ea42e21f68.name: All Devices with Duplicate MAC
68a3dfa329b270ea42e21f68.description: MAC is a key field in correlation; if the multiple of the same MAC is found, this could be bad data, and be reviewed why multiples are being seen

config.text: Possible Under Correlation
All Devices with Duplicate MAC

68a3dfa329b270ea42e21f6b.name: Devices With Same MAC - Excluded From Correlation
68a3dfa329b270ea42e21f6b.description: In Axonius, "Normalization Reasons" provide insight into why asset data from different sources might not be automatically correlated, helping users understand and resolve discrepancies. These reasons are detailed in the "Normalization Reasons" table, indicating the specific field, value, and time within the discovery cycle when the normalization issue occurred.

query.filter: ((("specific_data.data.os.is_windows_server_preferred" == true) or (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["FreeBSD","Linux"]) and (("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == ({"$exists":true,"$ne":""}))) and not ("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == "Junos OS")) or (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["Data ONTAP","IBM","NetApp ONTAP","Oracle","Solaris","VMWare"]) or ("specific_data.data.os.os_str" == regex("^(?!windows).*(?:emc|storage).*$", "i")) or ("specific_data.data.device_model_preferred" == regex("^(?:UCS[A-Z]|N[0-9]{2}-[A-Z][0-9]{4}).*$", "i"))) or ("labels" in ["LSA","WSA"]))) and not ("labels" in ["EXLSA","EXLWA","EXWSA"])
query.onlyExpressionsFilter: ((("specific_data.data.os.is_windows_server_preferred" == true) or (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["FreeBSD","Linux"]) and (("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == ({"$exists":true,"$ne":""}))) and not ("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == "Junos OS")) or (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["Data ONTAP","IBM","NetApp ONTAP","Oracle","Solaris","VMWare"]) or ("specific_data.data.os.os_str" == regex("^(?!windows).*(?:emc|storage).*$", "i")) or ("specific_data.data.device_model_preferred" == regex("^(?:UCS[A-Z]|N[0-9]{2}-[A-Z][0-9]{4}).*$", "i"))) or ("labels" in ["LSA","WSA"]))) and not ("labels" in ["EXLSA","EXLWA","EXWSA"])

66eaf2848dbe629a9fa1b3f2.name: SCOPE_WA - All Workstations [3]
66eaf2848dbe629a9fa1b3f2.description:
Devices that are Workstations. Derived from a combination of all operating system queries in this device category.

Note: Includes macOS and Windows devices.

query.filter: (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["Linux","OS X","Windows","macOS"]) and (("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == ({"$exists":true,"$ne":""}))) and ("specific_data.data.os.is_windows_server_preferred" == false) or (("labels" in ["LWA","MWA","WWA"]))) and not ("labels" == "LSA")
query.onlyExpressionsFilter: (("specific_data.data.os.type_preferred" in ["Linux","OS X","Windows","macOS"]) and (("specific_data.data.os.distribution_preferred" == ({"$exists":true,"$ne":""}))) and ("specific_data.data.os.is_windows_server_preferred" == false) or (("labels" in ["LWA","MWA","WWA"]))) and not ("labels" == "LSA")
